item.title: Investigation on Roundup - glyphosate at VitaminDWiki
item.description:
This is an attempt to see if Roundup/Glyphosate causes problems with Vitamin D - started May 2013

Hypothesis: Glyphosate ==> disrupt enzyme ==> one of the causes of vitamin D reduction

Reasons to think that the hypothesis is correct

  1. Glyphosate ==> disrupt enzyme: conclusion of one study (would really like more . . )

  2. In the past 40 years that Glyphosate has been increasing, vitamin D has been decreasing.

  3. The close association between increased use of Glyphosate and increased diseases that are associated with low levels of vitamin D - such as Autism
